summary: AS WE WERE DRIVING ON THE WAY TO SCHOOL, THE BACK WINDSHIELD EXPLODED WITH A LOUD BANG. THE DEFROSTING  WAS NOT ON. IT WAS IN THE LOW 50S OUTSIDE, SO NOT TOO COLD. THERE ABSOLUTELY NO IMPACT OF ANY KIND. ALSO RIGHT AFTER IT HAPPENED THERE WAS A STRONG SMELL OF BURNT ELECTRONIC IN THE TRUCK, THAT LASTED A LONG TIME.
